descriptions:
['Description3 Bedroom + Maid Townhouse in Amaranta , Villanova by Dubai Properties
Handover in first quarter of 2020
Secondary Market
40% Paid
60% on Handover
Located in Villanova a master project by Dubai Properties, Amaranta townhouses are setting a new benchmark for luxury villas and townhouses in Dubai. The project features beautifully designed 2, 3 and 4 bedroom Townhouses that echo the timeless Spanish design. These designs are artfully planned to provide spacious homes for those who want a comfortable and relaxing lifestyle.
Amaranta offers innovative Mediterranean inspired cluster homes. These designs combine four different unites in an enclosed courtyard with each of them having its own private backyard. The facades of the cluster homes showcase influence of the Mediterranean culture and architecture as displayed in the use of arches, textured facades, columns and slanted roofs. These traditional designs are usually found in Mediterranean homes in Italy, Portugal, Greece and Spain.
Further, Amaranta’s location within Villanova community creates an integrated neighborhood for resident to blend and make new friends.Moreover, Villanova also offer many life-enriching facilities and amenities such as; kids play areas, a nursery, a school, a mosques, sports facilities, parks and green spaces, and food and beverages outlets. Villanova park has an iconic linear design that runs through the entire community connecting residents together.
Villanova by DP is located in Dubailand; a prime location in close proximity to Emirates Road and Al Ain Road. In addition this location puts the development near Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road which gives the residents access to major destinations in the city. Dubailand is also home to many of Dubai’s attractions such as; the Autodrome, Dubai Outlet Mall and Dubai Global Village.']

['DescriptionTata Nfon and  Ascot and Co. Real Estate are pleased to offer this independent two bedroom in Jumeirah Village Triangle that has been well maintained and it has got a lovely landscaped garden.  It’s an Arabic type villa and the seller is motivated to  sell, it comes with  a huge sitting room on the  ground floor, maid’s quarters, kitchen  which opens to the breakfast area.  Both rooms are  on the first  floor with attached bathrooms and a huge  landing area that can be used as a family  room or a study.   Both rooms have built  in closets and two huge balconies.   It has 2,700  square feet built  up area and  a huge 6,900  square feet plot.  The  owner has the title deed in hand and this property is ready to be transferred.
For more  information or to arrange an appointment to view please call Tata Nfon on +971557213094.
